text: Alexandre Bolduc (born June 26, 1985 in Montreal, Quebec) is a Canadian professional ice hockey centre who currently plays for the Arizona Coyotes of the National Hockey League (NHL). Bolduc was selected by the St. Louis Blues with the 127th pick in the 2004 NHL Draft but never played for them. He has also played for the Vancouver Canucks. He signed a contract with the Coyotes on July 2, 2011. ==References== * Category:1985 births Category:Living people Category:Arizona Coyotes players Category:Canadian ice hockey centres Category:Chicago Wolves players Category:ECHL players Category:Ice hockey people from Quebec Category:Manitoba Moose players Category:People from Montreal Category:Phoenix Coyotes players Category:Portland Pirates players Category:Rouyn-Noranda Huskies players Category:Shawinigan Cataractes players Category:Vancouver Canucks players
title: Alexandre Bolduc
